show_name: Encouragement of Climb: Gift of Memories (OAV)
other_title: ヤマノススメ おもいでプレゼント (Japanese)
plot: When Aoi and Hinata open a treasure chest in Aoi's room that's filled with fancy accessories, Hinata remembers her childhood memories with Aoi.
ending_theme: "Omoide Creators (おもいでクリエイターズ)" by Yuka Iguchi & Kana Asumi
